set.name: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, return up to 2 creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't attack unless you have 3 or more tapped creatures.

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Race
property.value: Noir Abyss

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, you may put an Abyss creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard.

property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 2 cards of our deck. You may put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy it.

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return an Abyss from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -7000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Veil Abyss

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Abyss, you may put it into your hand. If it's not an Abyss or you don't put it into your hand, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Veil Abyss

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, if you have another Abyss, draw a card. ■ Your Abyss cost 1 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Ultra Saver: Abyss (When one of your Abyss would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Start WIN CoroCoro Deck: Abyssbell Energy

property.name: Race
property.value: Veil Abyss

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: When you put this creature, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures and put them into the owner's mana zone. ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's elements that costs 5 or less and put it into it's owner's mana zone.
